articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: US Storms Kill 13, Biden's Global Commitment, Louisiana Abortion Law, and More
articles.description: A series of impactful events have recently unfolded across the U.S. Severe storms killed 13 in Texas, Arkansas, and Oklahoma. President Biden emphasized U.S. support to global allies in his West Point speech. Louisiana introduced a new law reclassifying abortion pills, while Trump faced criticism at the Libertarian convention.
articles.content:
Following is a summary of current US domestic news briefs.
At least 13 dead from storms in Texas, Arkansas, Oklahoma

articles.title: Bill Gross says Trump is 'bearish' choice for bond markets
articles.description: Gross, once the most influential voice in the market, predicted to the paper that a second Trump presidency would push deficits higher than re-electing President Joe Biden. "Trump is the more bearish of the candidates simply because his programs advocate continued tax cuts and more expensive things," Gross said.
articles.content:
